channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1635; 10:40PM; 1125 W 6th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3nax7Fu; #Westlake; It took 84 firefighters 26 minutes to extinguish heavy fire on the fourth floor and small amounts of fire on other floors of the vacant five-story office building. Fire investigators are en route to attempt to determine the fire's cause. No reported injuries. ; FS 3; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 1; AR1 BC1 BC11 BC13 BC5 CM20 CM22 E1 E10 E11 E203 E209 E210 E211 E220 E227 E27 E3 E9 EA1 EM1 EM11 HR3 RA11 RA209 RA27 RA3 RA803 RA827 SQ21 T10 T11 T20 T27 T3 T9 UR27 UR88; CH7; 13 14; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1673; 10:45PM; 14379 W Tyler St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3YX0f0g; #Sylmar; One-story single family home with fire showing. Offensive mode.; FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 E275 E298 E91 RA891 RA91 T75 T98; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange

Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#1635; 10:14PM; 1125 W 6th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3nax7Fu; #Westlake; Five-story sealed office building with heavy fire showing from the 4th floor. Two additional task forces requested. Offensive mode.; FS 3; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC1 E11 E203 E3 RA3 RA803 SQ21 T3; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

title.a: Update Greater Alarm Structure Fire 03/20/2023 INC#0328

item.description: Update Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#0328; 12:25PM; 9010 N Tobias Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/407wziA; #PanoramaCity; This morning's fire in Panorama City displaced a total of 16 people from 10 units that are damaged and currently unlivable. American Red Cross responded to assist those displaced residents. Sadly, one canine was found dead at the scene. The patient count from earlier remains unchanged: 11 evaluated/treated, 5 transported (1 serious, 4 fair-to-moderate), 6 declined transport/further care.; FS 7; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; AP58 AP7 AR1 AR21 BC10 BC12 BC14 BC15 CM40 CM42 E100 E239 E273 E275 E287 E288 E289 E290 E298 E39 E7 E90 EA1 EM10 EM14 EM15 EM17 HR3 PI1 PI2 RA18 RA39 RA7 RA75 RA839 RA86 RA87 RA88 RA881 RA91 RA98 RM4 T39 T73 T75 T87 T89 T90 T98 UR88 UR89; CH8; 14 18; Nicholas Prange

title.a: KNOCKDOWN Greater Alarm Structure Fire 03/20/2023 INC#0328

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#0328; 07:37AM; 9010 N Tobias Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/407wziA; #PanoramaCity; Approximately 100 firefighters battled flames that consumed at least 5 units in a four-story apartment building (3 residential floors over parking) that houses approximately 200 units. **At least** five patients are being evaluated on scene for injuries/illness, and (so far) two have been transported to local hospital(s). It took 44 minutes to eliminate the fire. The medical component is still active, and firefighters continue to search for residents whose health has been impacted. MEDIA: Please stage on the Van Nuys Blvd side of the fire building for information updates.; FS 7; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; AP7 AR1 AR21 BC10 BC12 BC14 BC15 CM40 CM42 E100 E239 E273 E275 E287 E288 E289 E290 E298 E39 E7 E90 EM10 EM14 EM15 EM17 HR3 PI1 RA18 RA39 RA7 RA75 RA839 RA87 RA88 RA881 RA91 RM4 T39 T73 T75 T87 T89 T90 T98 UR88 UR89; CH9; 14 18; Nicholas Prange

title.a: Update Greater Alarm Structure Fire 03/20/2023 INC#0328

item.description: Update Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#0328; 07:25AM; 9010 N Tobias Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/407wziA; #PanoramaCity; Firefighters continue to extinguish the flames inside, while Paramedic Firefighters outside are assessing multiple patients for injury/illness. LAFD PIO Captain Erik Scott and PIO Firefighter David Ortiz are en route to the scene, ETA 7:40am.; FS 7; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; AR1 BC10 BC12 BC14 BC15 CM40 CM42 E100 E239 E273 E275 E287 E288 E289 E290 E298 E39 E7 E90 EM10 EM14 EM15 EM17 HR3 PI1 RA18 RA39 RA7 RA75 RA87 RA88 RA91 T39 T73 T75 T87 T89 T90 T98 UR88 UR89; CH9; 14 18; Nicholas Prange

title.a: KNOCKDOWN Greater Alarm Structure Fire 03/20/2023 INC#0274

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#0274; 06:50AM; 162 N Reno St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3yOX6oE; #Westlake; It took 52 firefighters 40 minutes to extinguish the flames inside of a vacant one-story home. Firefighters protected nearby structures on adjacent properties. One firefighter was transported to the hospital with non-life-threatening injuries, after falling through the floor. No other injuries. ; FS 6; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 13; BC1 BC11 BC5 CM20 CM22 E13 E20 E203 E210 E211 E220 E229 E27 E29 E52 E6 EA1 EM11 EM18 HR3 RA20 RA3 RA6 RA806 RM1 SQ21 T10 T11 T20 T29 T3 UR3 UR88; CH9; 13 14; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0328; 06:53AM; 9010 N Tobias Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/407wziA; #PanoramaCity; Four-story apartment building (3 over parking garage) with smoke showing. Offensive mode.; FS 7; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC12 E275 E290 E7 E90 RA7 RA75 T75 T90; CH9; 18; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0274; 06:10AM; 162 N Reno St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3yOX6oE; #Westlake; One-story single-family home (possibly vacant) with smoke showing. Offensive mode. ; FS 6; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 13; BC11 E20 E211 E220 E52 E6 RA6 T11 T20; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

Traffic Collision with Entrapment; INC#1722; 11:37PM; 1234 E Washington Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3TqxGr1; #CentralAlameda; Firefighters arrived on scene of a collision, reported to be at the end of a police pursuit, to find one patient trapped, and others injured. Firefighters extricated one patient who was transported in critical condition. At least two other patients were evaluated, but found to be with only minor injuries, and not requesting transport at this time. Unknown age/gender/affiliation/circumstances. LAPD Inc #4221.; FS 14; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 E14 E17 E210 E9 EM1 HR3 RA10 RA14 RA804 T10; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange
